doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Mozammel Haque
doctor.specialty: Pediatric Surgery Specialist & Pediatric Laparoscopic Surgeon
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Mozammel Haque is a Pediatric Surgeon in Chittagong. His qualification is MBBS, MS (Pediatric Surgery), FACS (USA). He is a Professor & Head of the Dept, Pediatric Surgery at Chattogram Maa-O-Shishu Hospital Medical College. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Max Hospital & Diagnostic, Chittagong. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Md. Mozammel Haque at Max Hospital & Diagnostic, Chittagong is 1pm to 3pm (Closed: Friday).
